alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fremont County through 330 PM MDT... At 259 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Royal Gorge, or 26 miles northeast of Hayden Pass Burn Scar, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rain and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Royal Gorge and Canon City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
